comments:
While updating a project from CVS I got this exception in the log. It was 
repeatable.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.ui 4 1 Jun 18, 2002 18:11:16.986
!MESSAGE Internal error occured.
!STACK 0
java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: 8
	at java.lang.String.charAt(Unknown Source)
	at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.util.CVSDateFormatter.entryLineToDate
(CVSDateFormatter.java:48)
	at 
org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.syncinfo.ResourceSyncInfo.setEntryLine
(ResourceSyncInfo.java:440)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.syncinfo.ResourceSyncInfo.<init>
(ResourceSyncInfo.java:101)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.UpdatedHandler.handle
(UpdatedHandler.java:76)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Request.executeRequest
(Request.java:189)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Command.doExecute
(Command.java:390)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Command$2.run
(Command.java:322)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseFolder$2.run
(EclipseFolder.java:277)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run
(Workspace.java:1361)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.resources.EclipseFolder.run
(EclipseFolder.java:270)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Command.execute
(Command.java:333)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.client.Update.execute
(Update.java:87)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.core.CVSTeamProvider.update
(CVSTeamProvider.java:805)
	at org.eclipse.team.internal.ccvs.ui.actions.UpdateAction$1.execute
(UpdateAction.java:56)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation$1.run
(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:64)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run
(Workspace.java:1361)
	at org.eclipse.ui.actions.WorkspaceModifyOperation.run
(WorkspaceModifyOperation.java:78)
	at org.eclipse.jface.operation.ModalContext$ModalContextThread.run
(ModalContext.java:98)
!ENTRY org.eclipse.team.ui 4 1 Jun 18, 2002 18:11:55.361

I assume this was against CVSNT 1.11.1.3?

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 19791 ***
